title: Getting Started with Next.js
content: Next.js is a React framework that supports file-based routing, server rendering, and static generation.

title: Static Generation Basics
content: Static generation creates HTML at build time for fast delivery and great SEO.

title: Dynamic Routes in Pages Router
content: Use files like pages/blog/[id].js and getStaticPaths to build dynamic routes.

title: Fallback Rendering
content: With fallback: true, Next.js can generate new pages on demand after the build.

title: Data Fetching Patterns
content: getStaticProps runs at build time and passes data to your page as props.
